name: Astro-Shroom
description: He's had good meetings with a lot of smaller asteroids. They really made an impression.

name: Astrocado Pit
description: Getting defeated is the pits.

name: Atomic Bombegranate
description: Remember: Never ever EVER split a fruit. Oh, hold on, actually fruits are ok, just never split an atom.

name: Bamboozle
description: Only among the hyper-evolved Plants of Hollow Earth can you be outwitted by a tree.

name: Banana Bomb
description: Beware fruity vengeance from above.

name: Banana Launcher
description: He only knows one word. But it's a good one.

name: Banana Peel
description: A slapstick comedy staple that, somehow, the Zombies never see coming.

name: Berry Angry
description: "Now you've done it! That's the last straw! I'm gonna berry you!"

name: Berry Blast
description: Vicious AND nutritious.

name: Big Chill
description: Discerning Plants agree: Zombies are best served on ice.

name: Blazing Bark
description: Captain Combustible knows how to light a fire under his teammates.

name: Blockbuster
description: They call it a graveyard. She calls it a buffet.

name: Blooming Heart
description: Sometimes we hurt the ones we love. Blooming Heart knows this all too well.

name: Bluesberry
description: Loves to make Zombies sing the blues.

name: Body-Gourd
description: He moonlights as a decorative center piece during the fall.

name: Bonk Choy
description: Little known fact: He used to have two teeth.

name: Bubble Up
description: Who doesn't like bubbles? Zombies...that's who.

name: Buff-Shroom
description: You might know him from his wildly popular series of workout videos called "30 Days to a Buff-Shroom Body."

name: Button Mushroom
description: Everyone's always telling her, "You're cute as a button!" But she's not just cute. She's smart and funny too.

name: Cabbage-Pult
description: "Coleslaw from above!"

name: Cactus
description: "It's true. I'm prickly on the outside but spongy on the inside."

name: Cherry Bomb
description: Explode? Detonate? ... Explodonate!

name: Coffee Grounds
description: Nothing wakes you up in the morning like extra attacks on zombies. Well OK, coffee does.

name: Corn Dog
description: Who's a good vegetable? You are! Yes, you are!

name: Cosmic Mushroom
description: He's far out all right. Like, waaaay far out.

name: Cosmic Nut
description: A staunch believer in numerology, he'll go on at length about the significance of the number 3 if you let him.

name: Cosmic Pea
description: "The cosmos is so big and a pea is so small. The juxtaposition just really makes me think, you know?"

name: Cro-Magnolia
description: In the secret groves of Hollow Earth, Magnolias evolved to shun steely stoicism, boasting blunt barbarity.

name: Dandy Lion King
description: He's developed a taste for Zombie Heroes.

name: Devour
description: Chompzilla enjoys eating Zombies whole. She does not enjoy the indigestion that follows.

name: Doom-Shroom
description: "I could destroy everything you hold dear. It wouldn't be hard."

name: Electric Blueberry
description: Does she strike a "random" Zombie with her lightning? Really? Or is she settling an old, unspoken score?

name: Embiggen
description: Livin' large, oh yeah.

name: Ensign Uproot
description: His mighty tractor beam is straight off the farm and out of this world.

name: Fertilize
description: Stinky, sure, but powerful stuff. Ask any Plant.

name: Fire Peashooter
description: "Is it getting hot in here or is it just me?"

name: Fireweed
description: Don't touch the floor. The floor is lava.

name: Flourish
description: Call it a growth spurt.

name: Force Field
description: It's a force of nature.

name: Forget-Me-Nuts
description: "I'd forget my own flower if it wasn't stuck to my head. Wait, what were we talking about?"

name: Galacta-Cactus
description: "I take pity on no one. For I am Galacta-Cactus!"

name: Gardening Gloves
description: Made of the softest fabric for that gentle Plant touch.

name: Garlic
description: "Vimpires. They're the worst. I don't like to use the word 'hate' but yeah, I hate 'em."

name: Genetic Amplification
description: The modifications are controversial, sure. But the results are hard to argue with.

name: Geyser
description: H2Oh no you didn't!

name: Gloom-Shroom
description: Some see him as depressed, but he's got a lot of sides.

name: Goatify
description: Rose turns Zombies into goats because... GOATS!

name: Grape Responsibility
description: When you think of responsibility, think of grapes.

name: Grapes of Wrath
description: "Everyone's always asking, 'Why so angry?' Because ZOMBIES! Sheesh. Obviously."

name: Grave Buster
description: "MUST. DESTROY. GRAVES."

name: Gravitree
description: The apple doesn't fall far from the tree. Neither does anything else.

name: Grizzly Pear
description: It's true what they say, "Never get between a Grizzly Pear and her cub." Doubly true for Zombies.

name: Grow-Shroom
description: She's always bringing out the best in others.

name: Guacodile
description: "Technically I'm a food, not a Plant."

name: Half-Banana
description: "Have you met my better half? She's around here somewhere."

name: Health-Nut
description: He always skips leg day.

name: Hibernating Beary
description: Don't poke the beary.

name: High-Voltage Currant
description: These trouble makers are just asking to get grounded.

name: Holo-Flora
description: You got Plants!

name: Hot Date
description: He's a hot commodity on dating sites such as eGardening, Thatch.com, and OKTulip.

name: Hot Lava
description: Lava has no loyalty. It's just hot. It just IS.

name: Hothead
description: Sure, he has an explosive temper. But for the most part, he's pretty even peeled.

name: Imitater
description: When asked the secret to fighting zombies, Imitater replied: "...." Truly a master of his craft.

name: Invasive Species
description: "Call me a 'weed.' Go on. I consider it a compliment."

name: Jugger-Nut
description: What's better than a Wall-Nut? A Wall-Nut in a suit of armor, that's what.

name: Kernel Corn
description: What he lacks in a sense of humor, he makes up with attitude... and dual Cob Busters.

name: Lava Guava
description: "'I try to stay cool, I really do. But Zombies! Man, they make me blow my top!"

name: Lieutenant Carrotron
description: Beta-Carrotina knows she can always count on him to get to the root of the problem.

name: Lightspeed Seed
description: Make the jump to light seed.

name: Loco Coco
description: He crowned himself King of All Hollow Earth. No one had the heart to tell him it was actually a parliamentary democracy.

name: Magic Beanstalk
description: Giant not included.

name: Marine Bean
description: Of course beans evolved gills. How else would they breathe underwater?

name: Meteor Strike
description: You would think this would be especially effective against Zombies riding dinosaurs...

name: Mirror-Nut
description: Dressed up as a mirrorball for a disco-themed party. Never looked back.

name: Molekale
description: "And you thought spinach made you strong. Please. I am spinach times infinity."

name: More Spore
description: One good mushroom deserves another.

name: Mush-Boom
description: Nightcap and his mushroom friends are not to be truffled with.

name: Mushroom Grotto
description: Sometimes beautiful things grow out of the darkest places. Ponder that for a few moments.

name: Mushroom Ringleader
description: Leadership comes with a lot of responsibility, but he knew what he signed up for.

name: Nut Signal
description: Call on Wall-Nut any time. His schedule is wide open.

name: Pair of Pears
description: It's cute how they're always completing each other's sentences.

name: Pair Pearadise
description: Peter Piper's Planet precociously picked a pair of pickled peppered pairs.

name: Pea Patch
description: Don't let the Dog Walker anywhere near it.

name: Pea Pod
description: Sometimes they squabble, but they usually get along like five peas in a pod.

name: Pea-Nut
description: "Mom was a Peashooter. Dad was a nut. Everyone said it wouldn't work, but they were wrong."

name: Pear Cub
description: So cute and cuddly and ... wait, what's that growling sound?

name: Peashooter
description: Started fighting Zombies in 2009... and never stopped.

name: Pecanolith
description: No one knows where he came from. He just appeared one day. But everyone who comes in contact with him feels... changed somehow.

name: Peel Shield
description: Orange you glad Citron is here to protect you?

name: Petal-Morphosis
description: For when it's time to turn over a new leaf.

name: Photosynthesizer
description: "The galaxy is one beautiful melody, so play!"

name: Pineclone
description: It's nothing personal; she just prefers the company of other Pineclones.

name: Pismashio
description: "I'm a kind of ice cream! Sort of!"

name: Plant Food
description: The most important meal of the day.

name: Plantern
description: Past job experience includes: Shooing away creepy fog.

name: Poison Ivy
description: "Guess who's itching for a fight? This guy right here!"

name: Poison Mushroom
description: "Zombie Heroes. Don't like 'em. Not one bit. Don't care who knows it, either."

name: Poison Oak
description: Gets lunch with Poison Ivy and Poison Mushroom every week. They have a lot to talk about.

name: Poppin' Poppies
description: Makes friends wherever she goes.

name: Potato Mine
description: "I'm starchy and explosive!"

name: Power Pummel
description: "Knuckle sandwiches for all my enemies!"

name: Precision Blast
description: Green Shadow's approach is right down the middle.

name: Prickly Pear
description: "You hurt me, I hurt you. That's how this works."

name: Primal Potato Mine
description: Hidden long ago in Hollow Earth, Dinosaurs ran rampant in The Land Before Mine.

name: Primal Wall-Nut
description: You can't be destroyed by a Rolling Stone when you basically are a Rolling Stone.

name: Puff-Shroom
description: He huffs and puffs and, occasionally, blows a Zombie down.

name: Pumpkin Shell
description: "Build your house on a solid foundation," they said. "Build your house on pumpkin."

name: Punish-Shroom
description: Believes revenge is best served. Period.

name: Re-Peat Moss
description: "To do what I do... it's TRICKY. I'll leave it at that."

name: Red Stinger
description: "I do stretching exercises every morning," he says. "It's important to stay physically and mentally nimble."

name: Reincarnation
description: "You never know what the next life has in store for you," she says. "So get the most out of this one while you can."

name: Repeater
description: "Yes! Yes! Let's do this! Let's do this!"

name: Root Wall
description: A good way to root for the Plants.

name: Sappy Place
description: Zombies just hate a sappy ending.

name: Scorched Earth
description: Unfortunately the Zombies were all out of SPF 9000.

name: Sea-Shroom
description: Teaches swimming lessons to disadvantaged Plants in his spare time.

name: Seedling
description: It's the tiny seed of a... nobody actually knows.

name: Sergeant Strongberry
description: He's intense, sure. But he just wants the berries to be all they can be.

name: Shamrocket
description: The bigger they are, the harder they go boom.

name: Shelf Mushroom
description: Legends of Hollow Earth whisper that if you stack up enough Shelf Mushrooms, you'll eventually reach the Surface World.

name: Shroom for Two
description: Shrooms, bless their hearts, always wanting to cuddle up cuddly-like.

name: Sizzle
description: Incredibly hot and full of electricity. So much ouch.

name: Skyshooter
description: The youngest Peashooter ever to earn a pilot's license. Also the only Peashooter ever to earn a pilot's license.

name: Smackadamia
description: Smackadamia wasn't born with smack smarts. He studied hard. He's a smackademic.

name: Small-Nut
description: A violin virtuoso, Small-Nut began taking lessons when he was still in the shell.

name: Sonic Bloom
description: Victory faster than the speed of sound.

name: Soul Patch
description: Has been gently encouraging Cherry Bomb and Sour Grapes to attend his meditation class.

name: Sour Grapes
description: Sour. Bitter. Resentful. It's all true. But he's got his reasons.

name: Spikeweed Sector
description: Quite similar to the region known as Pokey Province.

name: Spineapple
description: Don't let his gruff exterior fool you. He's always looking out for the little guy.

name: Starch-Lord
description: His destiny is written in the starch.

name: Steel Magnolia
description: She's got nerves of steel... and everything else of steel!

name: Sting Bean
description: "I try to warn them, 'This is going to sting.' But the Zombies, they never listen."

name: Storm Front
description: Bad for your picnic. Good for your plants.

name: Strawberrian
description: When it's time to fight, he gets pretty juiced.

name: Sunburn
description: Solar Flare never met a sunscreen strong enough to stop her.

name: Super-Phat Beets
description: When he drops the beet, everyone feels it. Especially the Zombies.

name: Sweet Pea
description: Zombies may only have four teeth left, but one of them's a sweet tooth.

name: Sweet Potato
description: Loves unicorns and rainbows... and watching cats on the Internet.

name: Tater Toss
description: Spudow is one tranquil tuber. Still, sometimes he loses his head.

name: The Podfather
description: "It ain't easy keeping the peas in this family."

name: Three-Nut
description: They say two heads are better than one. Three-Nut just took the next evolutionary step.

name: Time to Shine
description: Makes you feel all warm, glowy, and like kickin' Zombie butt.

name: Torchwood
description: "Feel the burn, I COMMAND YOU!"

name: Tough Beets
description: He grew up on the wrong side of the garden.

name: Transfiguration
description: "By Heisenberg's Uncertainty Principle, if you look at a Plant too closely, you actually change what that Plant is..."

name: Transmogrify
description: It's a life-changing experience. Actually, it's an everything-changing experience.

name: Tricarrotops
description: Beta-Carrotina tracked Huge-Gigantacus all the way down the Meteor-Z-carved tunnel to Hollow Earth. Carrots there had evolved in a very different direction.

name: Typical Beanstalk
description: "Everyone's magic in their own special way. Everyone except me."

name: Umbrella Leaf
description: She's not very frond of getting wet.

name: Uncrackable
description: Wall-Knight laughs, "A thousand broken nutcrackers tell the story."

name: Vegetation Mutation
description: Environmentalism at its finest.

name: Veloci-Radish Hatchling
description: The root of all primeval.

name: Veloci-Radish Packmate
description: Dedicated pack hunters, one roars a distraction while the other strikes from the side.

name: Wall-Nut
description: Works well with others. Says so, right there on his resume.

name: Wall-Nut Bowling
description: Ugly shoes not required!

name: Water Chestnut
description: "300 laps a day, every day. That's how I do it."

name: Weed Whack
description: Good for weeding out Zombies.

name: Whipvine
description: "Get along, little Zombie."

name: Whirlwind
description: There's no place like home. There's no place like home.

name: Wild Berry
description: What one word best describes Wild Berry? "Unpredictable."

name: Zapricot
description: "Some say that Zombies aren't easily shocked. I beg to differ."
